author: kfogel
msg: Locking branch: Bump the repository format number the first time the
locking features are used in a repository that predates 1.2.  See the
addition to svn_repos_fs_lock's doc string for details.
(check_repos_version): Rewrite comparison logic to allow the soft
svn_repos_fs_get_locks): Bump repository format number if appropriate.
svn_repos_fs_get_locks): Document that repository format number may
be bumped.  Be sure to use the "which see" idiom that so annoys Fitz.

author: sussman
msg: Locking branch:  autoversioning bugfix --  don't create empty revisions.
Part of issue #2161:  make all auto-checked-out resources share one txn.
(dav_svn_checkout):   refactor code.  try to fetch a 'shared'
activity name from r->pool's userdata before creating a whole new txn.
(dav_svn_checkin): if the shared activity exists, then commit the
txn and delete the shared activity.  if shared activity doesn't exist,
(dav_svn_uncheckout):  destroy the shared activity here too.

author: marcosc
msg: Fixed 24 fuzzy translations and 17 untranslated messages.

author: maxb
msg: * STATUS (r13358): Correct misplacement (move from approved -> candidate).
